lead_paragraph: BROGAN--Joseph Francis. On Monday, June 27, 2016 in Silver Spring, MD. Born March 24, 1925 in Manhattan, NY. Beloved husband of the late Annamae Kilcommons Brogan and the late May Brennan Brogan. Loving father of Stephen Joseph Brogan (Mary); grandfather of Kathleen Ann, Eileen Mary, Anne Marie, Mary Patricia, Joseph Peter, Theresa Brighid; great-grandfather of Mary Claire. A devout Roman Catholic, he graduated from St. Joseph School and Rice Catholic High School in New York City. He served in the South Pacific in World War II at Okinawa and other sites. He was a New York City Policeman serving as patrolman, Sergeant and Lieutenant, mostly in Harlem. Friends may call on Thursday, June 30, 2016 at St. John the Evangelist Catholic Church, 10103 Georgia Ave., Silver Spring, MD 20902 from 10am until time of Mass of Christian Burial at 11am. Interment Friday, July 1, at 12:30pm in Dagsboro, DE at Gate of Heaven Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, donations in his memory may be made to The Catholic Coalition for Special Education, PO Box 673, Kensington, MD 20895, www.ccse-maryland.org. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BROGAN, JOSEPH FRANCIS
